name: Lighter Than Air
description:
A small party of brave adventurers tries to cross the Atlantic Ocean on a self-built airship. Will all of them reach their destination, or are sacrifices to be made?

Controls: Drag people around using the mouse. Pop balloons by clicking on them.

Code: Simon Parzer and Florian Bogner
Graphics/Audio: Peter Sperl

Everything, with the exception of some audio files, was created during the jam.
Main theme by Peter Sperl.
